Here is the list of zodiac signs with their scores and descriptions:
1. Aries - 8/10 - Confident and action-oriented, but can be impulsive and reckless.
2. Taurus - 7.5/10 - Reliable and practical, but can be stubborn and resistant to change.
3. Gemini - 9/10 - Quick-witted and adaptable, but can be scattered and indecisive.
4. Cancer - 8.5/10 - Nurturing and empathetic, but can be overly sensitive and moody.
5. Leo - 9.5/10 - Confident and charismatic, but can be prideful and dominant.
6. Virgo - 8/10 - Analytical and hardworking, but can be perfectionistic and critical.
7. Libra - 9/10 - Diplomatic and social, but can be indecisive and people-pleasing.
8. Scorpio - 9/10 - Passionate and intense, but can be secretive and emotionally guarded.
9. Sagittarius - 8.5/10 - Adventurous and optimistic, but can be reckless and tactless.
10. Capricorn - 7.5/10 - Responsible and ambitious, but can be strict and unyielding.
11. Aquarius - 9/10 - Humanitarian and independent, but can be detached and unconventional.
12. Pisces - 8/10 - Imaginative and compassionate, but can be dreamy and easily influenced.
